籤詩版本二:
Mma agha ahụ na-egbukepụ egbukepụ mgbe ọ na-apụta n'igbe ahụ, ma ọ dịghị adọta ájá dị n'igbe ahụ.
Ugbu a enwere m onye a ma ama m ga-egosi, nwere ikike na ike, onye ọ bụla na-amasịkwa m
詩意:
Hexagram a na-anọchi anya mma agha na-apụta na igbe ahụ.
Ihe niile dị ike ma dị ike.
解曰: Mma agha ahụ si na igbe ahụ pụta. Na-egbuke egbuke ruo ọtụtụ puku kilomita. Ezi nduzi. Ihe niile mara mma.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zhao Zilong na-azọpụta Adou
N'ime oge nke alaeze atọ, Zhao Yun, aha ọma Zilong, bụ onye Changshan. Na mbụ, ọ dabere na Yuan Shao, wee soro Liu (Bei), onye nwe mbụ nke Western Shu.
N'oge ahụ, Cao Cao chọrọ ịga n'ebe ndịda nke Osimiri Yangtze, o buru ụzọ wakpoo onye mbụ Liu Bei na Xinye (aha ebe), na onye mbụ gbagara Fanching. E meriri ya ọzọ na Dangyang ma kewapụrụ ndị ezi na ụlọ ya Zhao Yun zutere Oriakụ Wei ( Oriakụ Liu Bei) n'okpuru mgbidi ụwa.
Nwanyị ahụ nyere nwa ya nwoke Adou (Nwa Liu Bei, Liu Chan) n'aka Zhao Yun. Zhao Yun nyere nwanyị ahụ ịnyịnya ahụ, ma nwanyị ahụ jụrụ ịnara ya wee tụba onwe ya n'ime olulu mmiri wee nwụọ.
Mgbe Zhao Yun kwara akwa ma lie nwunye ya, ọ makụrụ Adou wee lụọ ọgụ n'ụzọ ya na nnọchibido ahụ.
聖意: Kpee ekpere maka ihe ọma n'ụlọ gị na ụlọ gị, kpee ekpere maka uru ego, chioma na azụmahịa, ezigbo alụmdi na nwunye, ndị na-agba ụkwụ ụmụ nwanyị, Chitian silkworms, mmebi anụ ụlọ isii mbụ, ndị na-efu efu, ikpe ọha, ịkwaga, ihe onwunwe furu efu, ọrịa ndịda, nloghachi. ochicho ochi, chioma ugwu na ili
第X籤: Iri abụọ na itoolu na-emeri lọtrị
